Method Detail

addNode

void addNode(java.lang.String parentid,
             java.lang.String id,
             java.lang.String uuid,
             boolean visibleInNav)
             throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Add a node.

Parameters:
parentid - where the node is to be added
id - e.g. "concepts"
uuid - The UUID.
labels - the labels of the node that is to be added
visibleInNav - the visibility of a node in the navigation. It is meant to hide specific nodes within the "public" navigation whereas the node is visible within the info/site area.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addNode

SiteTreeNode addNode(java.lang.String parentid,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String uuid,
                     boolean visibleInNav,
                     java.lang.String href,
                     java.lang.String suffix,
                     boolean link)
                     throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Add a node. TODO: Lenya 1.2.X supports argument visibleInNav

Parameters:
parentid - the node where the new node is to be inserted
id - the node id
uuid - The UUID.
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation. It is meant to hide specific nodes within the "public" navigation whereas the node is visible within the info/site area.
href - the href of the new node (internal and external references)
suffix - the suffix of the new node
link - Visibility of link respectively href. It is meant to support "grouping" nodes in the navigation which do not relate to a document (internal) or external link (www).
Returns:
A node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addNode

SiteTreeNode addNode(java.lang.String parentid,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String uuid,
                     boolean visibleInNav,
                     java.lang.String href,
                     java.lang.String suffix,
                     boolean link,
                     java.lang.String refPath)
                     throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Insert a node before a given node

Parameters:
parentid - the node where the new node is to be inserted
id - the node id
uuid - The UUID.
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
href - the href of the new node
suffix - the suffix of the new node
link - the link
refPath - path of the node, before which the new node will be inserted.
Returns:
A node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addNode

SiteTreeNode addNode(java.lang.String path,
                     java.lang.String uuid,
                     boolean visibleInNav,
                     java.lang.String href,
                     java.lang.String suffix,
                     boolean link)
                     throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Add a node. Compute the parent id and the id of the node from the path

Parameters:
path - the path of the new node. From this the parent-id and the id are computed
uuid - The UUID.
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
href - the href
suffix - the suffix
link - the link
Returns:
A node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

                     java.lang.String refpath)
                     throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Insert a node before a given node Compute the parent id and the id of the node from the path

Parameters:
path - the path of the new node. From this the parent-id and the id are computed
uuid - The UUID.
visibleInNav - determines the visibility of a node in the navigation
href - the href
suffix - the suffix
link - the link
refpath - path of the node, before which the new node will be inserted.
Returns:
A node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addNode

void addNode(SiteTreeNode node)
             throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Add a node. This method is typically used when publishing, i.e. when copying a node from the authoring tree to the live tree. The existing node already has a parent node (in the authoring tree). The node that is added will be a copy of the original node and will be inserted at the same parentid as the original node.

Parameters:
node - the SiteTreeNode that is to be added
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addNode

void addNode(SiteTreeNode node,
             java.lang.String refpath)
             throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Add a node. This method is typically used when publishing, i.e. when copying a node from the authoring tree to the live tree. The existing node already has a parent node (in the authoring tree). The node that is added will be a copy of the original node and will be inserted at the same parentid as the original node.

Parameters:
node - the SiteTreeNode that is to be added
refpath - path of the node, before which the new node will be inserted.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the addition failed

addLabel

void addLabel(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String language,
              java.lang.String label)
Add a label to an existing node

Parameters:
path - the path to which the label is to be added.
language - The language.
label - the label to add

setLabel

void setLabel(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String language,
              java.lang.String label)
Sets a label of an existing node. If the label does not exist, it is added. Otherwise, the existing label is replaced.

Parameters:
path - the path to which the label is to be added.
language - The language.
label - the label to add

removeLabel

void removeLabel(java.lang.String path,
                 java.lang.String language)
Remove a label from a node

Parameters:
path - the path from which the label is to be removed.
language - The language.

removeNode

SiteTreeNode removeNode(java.lang.String path)
Removes the node corresponding to the given path from the tree, and returns it.

Parameters:
path - the path of the node that is to be removed
Returns:
the removed node

getTopNodes

SiteTreeNode[] getTopNodes()
Return the top level nodes in the sitetree.

Returns:
the top nodes in the sitetree, or empty array if there are none

moveUp

void moveUp(java.lang.String path)
            throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Move up the node amongst its siblings.

Parameters:
path - The document id of the node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the moving failed.

moveDown

void moveDown(java.lang.String path)
              throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Move down the node amongst its siblings.

Parameters:
path - The document id of the node.
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if the moving failed.

importSubtree

void importSubtree(SiteTreeNode subtreeRoot,
                   SiteTreeNode newParent,
                   java.lang.String newid,
                   java.lang.String refpath)
                   throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Imports a subtree (from this or from another tree) at a certain position.

Parameters:
subtreeRoot - The root of the subtree to import.
newParent - The node where the subtree shall be inserted.
newid - The new id of the inserted subtreeRoot node (to not overwrite
refpath - The path corresponding to the reference node, before which the subtree should be inserted. If null, the subtree is inserted at the end. in case there is already a node with the same id in the tree).
Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - when an error occurs.

save

void save()
          throws org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException
Saves the tree. Call this method after a node has been changed.

Throws:
org.apache.lenya.cms.site.SiteException - if an error occurs.
